title: 51 perches with a Bungalow type house near Sri Jayawardanapura Hospital
details:
Location:
The property located very close to the Sri Jayawardhanapura Hospital and 2000 Plaza apartment complex is facing the lake and the canals surrounding the area and overlooking the Kimbulawala bird sanctuary. It is situated at the end of a short private lane bordering a small canal, off New Hospital Road.
The property can be easily accessed from Borella, Thalawathugoda, Maharagama, Nugegoda and Pitakotte.
▶2 minutes walk to Kimbulawala walking track and Foodcity,
▶5 minutes drive to parliament, Odel, Keels, Arpico supermarket and Hemas hospital.

Property Details:
51 perches of land with lush garden with mature trees (Bamboo bushes, Benjamina, Jack, Guava, Mango, Pihimbiya and Rambutang trees), and a charming, naturally ventilated, spacious split level house, with front and rear verandas, large courtyard with natural pond, 3 bedrooms (master bedroom with dressing area and attached bath), 2 bathrooms, spacious living and dining areas, Tv room, modern pantry and curry kitchen, separate maid's room and bathroom, 4 car garage and parking for several more vehicles within the property . Ideal for nature lovers, especially bird lovers as the garden is frequently visited by birds.
